uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean

Class PermissionsBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean.PermissionsBean

  • public class PermissionsBean
extends Object
    A Bean that has various helper methods to check whether certain things can be done to a RWikiObject
    Author:
    andrew

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PermissionsBean() 
      PermissionsBean(RWikiObject rwikiObject, RWikiObjectService objectService)
      Creates a fully set-up PermissionsBean

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RWikiObjectService getObjectService()
      The currently set RWikiObjectService
      RWikiObject getRwikiObject()
      The current RWikiObject.
      boolean isAdminAllowed()
      Using the current objectService checks whether admin functions can be performed on the current RWikiObject by the currentUser.
      boolean isReadAllowed()
      Using the current objectService checks whether the current RWikiObject can be read by the currentUser.
      boolean isUpdateAllowed()
      Using the current objectService checks whether update can be performed on the current RWikiObject by the currentUser.

      Sets the current RWikiObjectService
      void setRwikiObject(RWikiObject rwikiObject)

      • isAdminAllowed

        public boolean isAdminAllowed()
        Using the current objectService checks whether admin functions can be performed on the current RWikiObject by the currentUser.
        Returns:
        true if the currentUser has admin rights on this rwikiObject.

      • isUpdateAllowed

        public boolean isUpdateAllowed()
        Using the current objectService checks whether update can be performed on the current RWikiObject by the currentUser.
        Returns:
        true if the currentUser has update rights on this rwikiObject

      • isReadAllowed

        public boolean isReadAllowed()
        Using the current objectService checks whether the current RWikiObject can be read by the currentUser.
        Returns:
        true if the currentUser has read rights on this rwikiObject.
